QuestionStem: Which statements are evidence that support your answer to the previous question? Select all that apply.

options.AnswerText: C. Only one cell is visible.
D. More than one cell is visible.

CorrectFeedback: The image is from a lower level of magnification, so many cells can be observed. However, only larger cell structures, such as the cell walls and chloroplasts, can be seen in each cell.
PartiallyCorrectFeedback: Recall what “uni-“ and “multi-“ mean. Think about the differences between plant and animal cells as you select your answers.
IncorrectFeedback: Recall what “uni-“ and “multi-“ mean. Think about the differences between plant and animal cells as you select your answers.
FinalIncorrectFeedback: The image is from a lower level of magnification, so many cells can be observed. However, only larger cell structures, such as the cell walls and chloroplasts, can be seen in each cell.
